title: Quiet, comfortable 1 + 1/2 BR Apt Convenient Location near Japantown
posting_body: A bright  "1+” bedroom apartment in a great location just a block north of Japantown and one block east of Fillmore Street.
Nice, bright, large, living room with bay windows.
First bedroom is a comfortable size with a large closet.
The “+” is a very small room off the kitchen and has been used in the past as a home office or small 2nd “kid’s”bedroom (approximately 8ft x 8ft with a closet) — fits a twin size bed only.
This apartment is in a quiet building with quiet neighbors.
$2,800 monthly rent with a one-year lease, then month to month thereafter.
Water and trash included in rent.
Security deposit of one month's rent is required with 1st full month's rent upon signing lease.
This is a rent controlled building so no surprises or sudden rent increases.
Available for immediate move-in upon approval.
If you wish to see the apartment please call or text the building manager at

A great location for all your needs within walking distance and convenient .... within a block or two to multiple bus lines (to downtown and cross-town), shops, several large grocery stores, drug stores, restaurants of every type, post office, movie theaters, clubs, ...
